content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What price range are you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price, but I am also willing to pay a reasonable price. Can you tell me the current rental price?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Sure, Nesibe. The current rental price for this apartment is 600 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
That is a bit high for me. Can you negotiate with me?

Also, I want to make sure that I can pay the rent on time every month. Can you tell me if there are any penalties or late fees for late payments?

Lastly, can you tell me if there are any restrictions on who can live in the apartment?

Please let me know when you are available to discuss this further.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I am open to negotiating with you to find a mutually beneficial rental agreement. As for your questions, there are no penalties or late fees for late payments, as long as you pay the rent on time every month. As for restrictions on who can live in the apartment, I do not have any specific restrictions at this time. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns. I am available to discuss this further at your convenience.
name: Heinrich Heine
